availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Creed H. Craddock (Green County, Kentucky, farmer tenant and justice of the peace)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer tenant and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Son of Robert Craddock and Betsy Craddock. Married to Elizabeth Sandidge Craddock. Father of Elizabeth A. Craddock, Robert F. Craddock, Mary J. Craddock, Lucy D. Craddock, Almeda E. Craddock, Orazelphia "Rozelphia" Craddock, Harriet B. Craddock, and John G. Craddock. Married to Martha A. Craddock. Resident in Green County, Kentucky, in 1840. Resident in Green County in 1850. Tenant farmer in Green County in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Green County in 1862. Died in Green County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Southern District, p.168.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 97B-98A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 545.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #28542.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Green County Wills, vol. 1-4, 1794-1901, p. 169-172.
KYR-0001-031-0088.
